original_title: ¿Qué le vas a pedir a los Reyes?
overview: Cintia is currently 30 years old. On January 6, 2022, she decided to publish on her social networks, a story she lived in her childhood. When she was 6 or 7 years old, she wrote an unusual letter to the Three Wise Men.
title: ¿Qué le vas a pedir a los Reyes?
